About

I'm an experienced iOS developer with over a decade of expertise in end-to-end mobile app development. My skills cover API integration, unit testing, and App Store releases, ensuring high-quality applications that deliver seamless user experiences. I specialize in building efficient, user-focused apps that combine technical excellence with intuitive design, fostering user engagement and satisfaction.

With a foundation in Applied Mathematics, I’ve become increasingly curious about how Machine Learning and MLOps drive AI-driven solutions. I’ve been exploring TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn, as well as tools like MLflow and AWS Cloud. My goal is to build scalable, data-driven systems that address real-world challenges and contribute to innovative ML projects.

Contact Me

Let’s connect and explore how I can contribute to innovative projects and bring value to your organization!

mihran.dovlatyan@gmail.com

Baby Food

Provides nutritious and delicious baby food recipes, ideal for children from 6 months. With over 70 solid meal options, users can filter recipes by age and meal time, follow simple step-by-step instructions, and save favorites. Additional features include a shopping list, recipe search, and the ability to share recipes via social networks.

View Page

SecurePIM

SecurePIM is a secure and intuitive mobile team collaboration solution designed for authorities and organizations. It combines essential business features such as email, messenger, contacts, calendar, tasks, notes, web browser, documents, and camera—all in one app, while ensuring GDPR compliance. With SecurePIM, employees can securely use their mobile devices for both work and personal purposes, with corporate data stored separately in a secure container. It supports central app configuration, MDM solutions, and integrates with existing infrastructures such as MS Exchange, Active Directory, and SharePoint. Key features include secure email management with S/MIME encryption, team mailboxes, secure messaging, calendar integration, and secure file access.

View Page

Ricardo.ch

The Ricardo app is Switzerland’s largest online second-hand marketplace, allowing you to buy, sell, bid, and auction new and preloved items, from vintage treasures to bargains, starting from just CHF 1. With four million members and over two million listings, you can find everything from clothing and electronics to antiques and furniture. Ricardo ensures buyer and seller protection, making it a secure marketplace for all transactions. The app also offers easy shipping through Swiss Post, and the ability to suggest prices or save searches for future offers. With a focus on sustainability, buying and selling used goods helps reduce waste and save money.

View Page

Shore Business

The Shore Business App is your portable appointment manager for smartphones and tablets, allowing you to easily manage appointments, staff work hours, and communication with customers and employees. The app syncs seamlessly with the desktop version, ensuring real-time updates across all devices. Key features include an online calendar for appointment management, customer profile handling, shift planning for iPad, and a built-in messaging system. A Shore account is required to use the app, and a free trial is available on the website.

View Page

Leben In Deutschland

With the help of this app, you can thoroughly prepare for the "Einbürgerungstest," the test required to obtain German citizenship. The app provides access to all 310 questions, including general and state-specific ones, helping you learn, practice, and improve your skills to pass the exam.

View Page

Hay Gitak

We have developed a unique quiz application exclusively in Armenian, focusing on Armenian culture, literature, history, habits, and more. What sets it apart is its interactive features, allowing users to engage in one-on-one or group competitions while testing their knowledge.

Nu, pogodi!

Real classic version of the game Nu Pogodi is offered. The game is simple, entertaining and funny, and followed by a fantastic background music from the same cartoon!

View Page

Parent Call

Parent Call is a simple application for children and old people to reach out for help if needed. Simply add the most important contacts in your list and press on the contact to make a call. You can edit contacts, change images, change order in the list. Switch to safe mode to lock the application for smaller children.

View Page

Life in the UK

The "Life in the UK: Citizenship Test Preparation App" (3rd Edition, updated for 2025) provides all the essential questions from the official guide, ensuring you're well-prepared for the British citizenship test. With a focus on English language comprehension at ESOL Entry Level 3, the app offers practice tests, immediate feedback on answers, and efficient study tools. You can review incorrect answers, take mock tests, and even translate unfamiliar words into your native language to strengthen your understanding.

View Page

France Naturalisation

The Prefecture provides a comprehensive catalog of approved questions for the "Livret du Citoyen" test, covering all relevant topics for the naturalization exam. By studying these 210 questions, you will be fully prepared to master the material and pass the test. The app offers a feature where only one correct answer must be selected per question, and you will immediately see the correct answer. Additionally, you can review incorrect answers, take practice tests, and assess your skills before the real exam.

View Page

Czech Realities

This Test Question Database contains all 300 questions for the Czech Life and Institutions Exam, which is required for Czech naturalization. The questions are divided into three areas: Basic Information about Czech Life and Institutions (16 topics), Basic Geographical Information about the Czech Republic (7 topics), and Basic Historical and Cultural Information about the Czech Republic (7 topics). Each topic is represented by one test question, with four alternative answers. One answer is correct, and three are incorrect, and the questions may include statements, text, tables, or pictures. You can review all questions, mark incorrect answers for later practice, and take mock tests to assess your skills before the real exam.

View Page

CCSE

The "Constitutional and Sociocultural Knowledge of Spain Exam" (CCSE) assesses the test taker's knowledge of Spain's constitution, society, and culture, and is a legal requirement for those applying for Spanish citizenship. The exam consists of 25 questions covering topics such as government, legislation, citizen participation, culture, history, and society. To pass, you must answer 15 or more questions correctly. You can use a free mobile app to prepare, learn all questions, mark incorrect answers for later review, take practice tests, and translate unfamiliar words into your native language.

View Page

Greek Citizen

The Government of Greece evaluates the test taker’s knowledge of Greece’s geography, history, politics, and culture. Passing the test is a legal requirement for those applying for Greek citizenship. The exam consists of 20 questions, and you must answer at least 16 correctly to pass. Each question has only one correct answer. You can use a free mobile app to prepare, where you can learn all questions, mark incorrect answers for later review, take practice tests, and translate unfamiliar words into your native language.

View Page

Mtadaran

Our app offers a collection of inspirational quotes from famous people to help you speak beautifully and find the perfect words for any situation. Whether you're looking for a quote to use as a social media status or simply want to uplift your mood, our app makes it easy to search and discover quotes by keyword or author. You can save your favorite quotes and share them with friends, all through a simple and enjoyable design. Features include support for all screen sizes, multiple ways to browse quotes, and an easy search function.

View Page

Data Science Project

Demonstrates Data Science techniques using a machine learning model to predict NBA shot accuracy. The focus is on developing Streamlit app that provides visualizations for model training experiments and results. Key elements include feature engineering, hyperparameter tuning, and interpretability through SHAP values, allowing for comprehensive model evaluation. Integrates essential data science libraries, such as Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib, to manage data processing and create visual insights.

View Page

MLOps Project

This project demonstrates MLOps best practices using a machine learning model that predicts if an NBA player will make a specific shot or not. The emphasis is less on the machine learning model, and more on the automated data pipeline to train the model, the deployment of the model, and the monitoring of the model.

View Page

Scrap Webpage

Integrates essential libraries, such as openai, requests, and BeautifulSoup, to interact with the OpenAI API, manage web scraping, and process data effectively. These tools enable seamless content extraction and summarization for practical applications.

View Page

Sales Brochure GenAI

Demonstrates Agentic AI by combining LLMs to automate content creation for marketing, tutorials, and personalization.

View Page

Chat Between LLMs

A conversation between chatbots demonstrates how a structured list of messages enables conversational AI assistants to maintain context throughout the interaction.

Airline AI Assistant

Integrated image and sound generation capabilities into the AI assistant, further expanding its versatility and functionality.

HuggingFace

Hugging Face Transformers offer a powerful framework for state-of-the-art NLP, with the Pipeline API for easy inference, Tokenization for efficient preprocessing, and Quantization for optimized deployment.
